product_name: Mizuno Wave Rider 17 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The men's Mizuno Wave Rider 17 Road-Running Shoes supply excellent cushioning for neutral runners looking to put lots of miles behind them on training runs and races. Breathable nylon mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays keep feet cool. Nylon linings wick moisture away from your feet; outsole vents let hot, humid air escape so feet stay dry and cool, reducing the likelihood of blistering. U4ic midsole material provides resilient cushioning, and it's 30% lighter than the AP+ midsole found in other Mizuno shoes. Mizuno Wave(R) midsole technology disperses impact uniformly over length/width of midsole, providing unrivaled cushioning. Dynamotion Fit(TM) features uppers that mirror the motion of your feet so that you can run your best without any bunching, pulling or sliding. The men's Mizuno Wave Rider 17 Road-Running Shoes have rubber outsoles with deep flex grooves that deliver cushioning, flexibility and long wear in high-impact areas.
short_description: The men's Mizuno Wave Rider 17 Road-Running Shoes supply excellent cushioning for neutral runners looking to put lots of miles behind them on training runs and races.
